name: Vara
appearance: Black-barked bracelets from mangrove resin circle her wrists; hair braided with glow fungus beads. Smells of peat, salt, and tea.
character: Protective witch of her groves, wary of city games; honest in trade, sharp in defense.
talents: Brewing healing teas that take to bone
Hearing truth through a child's voice
flaws: Quick to take offense at grove insults
dreams: Secure resin rights without Black Net tolls
Adopt and raise a red-tide orphan safely
Teach the city to honor mangrove taboos
secrets: Bargained with the Mother of Eels in a flood year
Keeps a bone eel egg hidden in peat
Once guided a Ferryman path through roots and regrets it
